ISSUE.TITLE: Bash dependency inside containers
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I've noticed some bash scripting going on inside Drone which expects `bash` to be present in a container. With the "minimal containers" approach, this can become a problem. See for example: https://github.com/blendle/docker-ruby/pull/3 Any thoughts on refactoring the scripts to only use bourne-shell compatible scripts?
